title: In game problems
body: After the patch, everything in game looks way bigger. I can't click properly, and it just feels like a completely new game. All the options were restored to default such as sound and quickcast. I changed every option to what I had before, but its still different.

replies.body:
Hey DMF Krystalsexy,

When you say you can't click properly, is that because you're not used to it or because there's a technical issue preventing you from doing so?
